sentinel.led
Class Composite

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--sentinel.led.Event
        |
        +--sentinel.led.Composite
Direct Known Subclasses:
And, Aperiodic, AperiodicStar, Not, Or, Periodic, PeriodicStar, Plus, Sequence
public abstract class Composite
extends Event

The Composite class is an abstract class that is extended by all composite event operator classes. It contains methods that are common to all composite event operators.

Fields inherited from class sentinel.led.Event
chronCounter, contiCounter, cumulCounter, eventCategory, eventName, eventType, recentCounter, sendBackFlag, subscribedEvents, subscribedRules
 
Method Summary
abstract  void notify(Notifiable child, java.lang.Thread parent, Scheduler scheduler)
          All composite event operators should provide implementation for the notify method.

Method Detail

notify

public abstract void notify(Notifiable child,
                            java.lang.Thread parent,
                            Scheduler scheduler)
All composite event operators should provide implementation for the notify method. The logic of the notify() method depends on the semantics of the composite event operator.
